oai_dc:dc.dc:title: City of Nashville Water Works construction of waterline, Nashville, Tennessee, between 1925 and 1944
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An undated photograph showing the intake pier for new 48” water service line for City of Nashville. The L & N Bridge, built by Foster & Creighton Company in 1912, is pictured in the background. Forms part of Metro Archives Record Group City Water Works Collection. 1 b & w photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: W.L. Hailey Construction Company (Nashville, Tenn.)
